translation.en: And that's why I named my eighth poodle -after my fourth husband. -[audience laughs]
translation.fr:
J'ai donc appelé mon huitième caniche
comme mon quatrième mari.

translation.en: That's great, Dorothy,
but you know the ding just means the passenger seat belt sign is off,
translation.fr:
Mais ce signal signifie
qu'on peut détacher nos ceintures.

translation.en: not that it's time to share.
-[audience laughs] -Not in my day! [chuckles]
So, what brings you to Tampa, Lola?
translation.fr: Que viens-tu faire à Tampa, Lola ?

translation.en: Um, I'm actually moving there to live with my dad. He just retired.
translation.fr:
J'emménage avec mon père.
Il est à la retraite.

translation.en: Oh! What did he do?
He was kind of an entertainer.
Ooh... Like Celine Dion?
-[crowd cheers] -[announcer] Look at that!
[announcer 2] The Big Show has won -the US title! -[sparks hiss]
translation.fr: Big Show a gagné le titre !

translation.en: -[rock music stops abruptly] -Yep, just like Celine Dion.
-[audience laughs] -If Celine Dion ate an entire Vegas buffet -of Celine Dions. -[audience laughs]
translation.fr:
Céline Dion qui aurait mangé
des tas de Céline Dion.

translation.en: So now your dad's retired, what is he doing?
I think he's got his hands in a lot of stuff.
translation.fr: Il touche un peu à tout.

translation.en: Done, boom, yes!
-Dad, this is not a French braid. -[audience laughs]
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas une tresse française.

translation.en: Oh, man, I don't know why this is so hard.
There's something wrong with your hair.
I used to braid Mick Foley's hair all the time.
translation.fr: Je tressais les cheveux de Mick Foley.

translation.en: And he loved it.
-[audience laughs] -I've said it before and I'll say it again.
translation.fr: Je te l'ai déjà dit et je le répète.

translation.en: Stop comparing me to Mick Foley.
translation.fr: Ne me compare plus à Mick Foley.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Good morning. How's my Big Show?
translation.fr: Bonjour. Comment va mon Big Show ?

translation.en: And my little show... Oh.
[sighs] So, I went on this amazing run this morning
translation.fr: Je suis allée courir ce matin.

translation.en: and I tried to jog through the Starbucks drive-through again.
translation.fr:
J'ai tenté à nouveau de traverser
le drive du Starbucks.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Got into a real spicy conversation with the manager.
translation.fr:
J'ai eu une conversation corsée
avec le gérant.

translation.en: Long story short,
we are banned from that Starbucks.
But that's my favorite Starbucks! They always sneak me day-old cake pops.
translation.fr:
Mais c'est mon Starbucks préféré.
Ils m'offrent des gâteaux.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -[laughs] Well, if you wanna go there, you'll have to wear a disguise.
translation.fr: Pour y aller, tu devras te déguiser.

translation.en: Look at me.
What kind of disguise could I possibly wear?
translation.fr: En quoi je pourrais me déguiser ?

translation.en: [scoffs] Shrek? Hulk? Kool-Aid Man? Giant potato?
I could do this all day.
You know what, there's a Starbucks near the airport.
Ooh, yeah, about that, I can't go to the airport today to pick up Lola with you.
translation.fr:
Au fait, je ne pourrai pas venir
chercher Lola avec toi.

translation.en: No! You have to!
Lola's not just visiting this time,
translation.fr:
Lola vient emménager ici,
pas nous rendre visite.

translation.en: she's actually moving in with us. Everything has to be perfect!
translation.fr:
Lola vient emménager ici,
pas nous rendre visite. - Tout doit être parfait.
- Ça le sera. Ne t'en fais pas.

translation.en: -And it will be! Don't worry. -[audience laughs]
translation.fr:
- Tout doit être parfait.
- Ça le sera. Ne t'en fais pas.

translation.en: Just you being there will be enough. [kisses]
translation.fr: Si tu es là, ça suffira.

translation.en: No, it won't! I need you.
You class me up, Cassy.
You talked me out of wearing cargo shorts for our wedding.
translation.fr: Tu m'as évité le short à notre mariage.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -But not to the reception.
-[audience laughs] -Look, I'm sorry I can't go with you, but I have a really good reason.
translation.fr:
Désolée, j'ai une bonne raison
de ne pas venir.

translation.en: I finally got the Litman listing.
The house where the old lady died? Isn't that place super haunted?
translation.fr:
La maison où la vieille dame est morte ?
Elle est hantée.

translation.en: [scoffs] That's just a myth that turned out to be true.
translation.fr: Juste un mythe qui s'est avéré.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Look, no one's ever been able to sell that place.
translation.fr:
Personne n'a jamais pu vendre
cette maison.

translation.en: I sell it, I finally get my face on a bus bench.
translation.fr:
Si je la vends,
ma tête sera à l'arrêt de bus.

translation.en: You know, I've had my face on a bus bench.
translation.fr: J'ai eu le mien sur un banc de bus.

translation.en: It sucks. It's just butts, all day long.
translation.fr: C'est nul. Des fesses toute la journée.

translation.en: ADB. All Day Butts.
Can I go to the airport?
I love the smell of jet fuel in the morning.
translation.fr: J'aime l'odeur du kérosène au petit matin.

translation.en: Uh, no, JJ, you can go to school.
translation.fr: Non, JJ, tu peux aller à l'école.

translation.en: I'm just psyched to be getting a big sister.
translation.fr: J'ai hâte d'avoir une grande sœur.

translation.en: What are you talking about?
You already have a big sister. Me!
translation.fr: Tu en as déjà une. Moi !

translation.en: Oh, my God, I am losing my identity.
translation.fr: Oh, non. Je perds mon identité.

translation.en: Guys, MSS is a legit problem.
translation.fr: Le SSC, c'est un vrai problème.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -MSS?
Middle Sister Syndrome.
It's real and it affects one in three children -of three-children households. -[audience laughs]
translation.fr:
Ça touche un enfant sur trois
dans les foyers de trois enfants.

translation.en: Okay, I think we're being a little dramatic.
Dramatic?
I am not dramatic.
Do you all really think that I'm dramatic?
Tell me right now or I will run away forever.
translation.fr:
Dites-le-moi,
ou je m'enfuis pour toujours.

translation.en: Nobody say anything, -let's see if she's bluffing. -[audience laughs]
translation.fr: Ne dites rien. Voyons si elle bluffe.

translation.en: Okay, we have a few minutes before school.
translation.fr: On a quelques minutes avant l'école.

translation.en: I think I know who will cheer you up, if you're game, Doctor Mandy.
translation.fr:
Je sais qui te remontera le moral,
si tu es partante. Docteur Mandy ?

translation.en: Seriously? Do we have time?
Oh, we'll make time.
there's something terribly wrong with our patient!
translation.fr: Docteur, notre patient a un problème !

translation.en: -[suspenseful music plays] -You just gave her the one dose, right?
translation.fr: Vous lui avez donné la bonne dose ?

translation.en: [Big Show's gruff voice] Need more candy!
[yelling] Run! It's Giant JJ!
-[Cassy and Mandy scream] -[Big Show's gruff voice] Need more candy!
[Big Show's gruff voice] Need more candy!
[Big Show's gruff voice] Candy!
Okay, today's the day.
We gotta tell Mandy she's moving in with JJ, and give her room to Lola.
translation.fr:
On doit dire à Mandy
de libérer sa chambre pour Lola.

translation.en: [sighs] Do we have to? She is scary.
translation.fr: On est obligés ? Elle me fait peur.

translation.en: Especially when she goes into silent mode.
translation.fr: Surtout quand elle ne dit rien.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Please, I'm not scared of a tween.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas peur d'une pré-ado.

translation.en: I'm only scared of two things:
mascots and shopping for jeans at Banana Republic.
translation.fr:
Les mascottes et le shopping
chez Banana Republic.

translation.en: Hey, what's up?
Mandy!
Your mom wants to talk to you.
-[audience laughs] -That is a straight up lie.
I'm the dad and what I say goes. Lola's getting your room.
translation.fr:
En tant que père, je décide.
Lola prend ta chambre.

translation.en: You know, 'cause Lola's only spent summer vacations with us.
translation.fr:
Lola n'est toujours venue ici
qu'en vacances.

translation.en: You know, 'cause we promised she'd have her own room?
translation.fr:
On lui avait promis
qu'elle aurait sa propre chambre.

translation.en: Okay, great talk, honey. Love you!
-[chuckles] That was tough to watch. -[door closes]
She crushed you.
-[audience laughs] -You need a hug?
Yes, please.
I know that sneeze.
-[audience laughs] -JJ!
Oh, hey, Dad.
So before you get upset, just hear me out.
-I got nothing. -[audience laughs]
I just wanted to come pick up Lola with you.
"Aw, JJ! That's so sweet!"
-[audience laughs] -You can't do your own reaction.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas répondre à ma place.

translation.en: And you can't skip school.
You're in a lot of trouble, young lady.
I brought a confetti cannon.
You're in a little less trouble, young lady. Come on!
translation.fr: Ça va un peu moins barder.

translation.en: -[music fades] -Hey!
[stammering] You're that wrestler guy.
John Cena.
-[audience laughs] -John Cena?
Do I look like a guy that wakes up twice a night to moisturize?
translation.fr:
J'ai l'air de me lever la nuit
pour m'hydrater ?

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Dude, this is The Big Show.
Yes, I'm a huge fan!
translation.fr: Oui, je suis un grand fan.

translation.en: Officer Lance Johnson.
Can I have your autograph?
Hit the bricks, Johnson. My dad's a busy man.
translation.fr:
Mettez les voiles, Johnson.
Mon père est occupé.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -[chuckling] No, I'm not.
It'd be my pleasure. I'd do anything for the police.
translation.fr:
Avec plaisir.
Je ferais tout pour la police.

translation.en: Anything?
Yeah, so my mom got this killer job and moved to Belgium.
translation.fr:
Ma mère est donc partie
travailler en Belgique.

translation.en: Oh, so she's in the waffle industry?
translation.fr: Elle est dans l'industrie des gaufres ?

translation.en: Don't think that's a thing. -Wish it was, though. -[audience laughs]
But, anyways, that's why I'm moving here. To live with my dad, stepmom and half sisters.
translation.fr:
Je viens vivre ici avec mon père,
ma belle-mère et mes demi-sœurs.

translation.en: Well, that's a big change.
I'm actually super excited about it.
The weather is amazing.
My dad said I have my own room,
and there's a girl's hockey team at my new school.
translation.fr: et mon école a une équipe de hockey.

translation.en: Oh, you play hockey?
Dorothy, I'm from Minnesota. -We learn hockey before we learn math. -[Dorothy chuckles]
translation.fr:
Je viens du Minnesota.
On apprend le hockey avant les maths.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -So, is your dad picking you up?
No, I'm just gonna Uber. I don't need anyone to pick me up.
translation.fr:
Je prends un Uber.
Pas besoin qu'on vienne me chercher.

translation.en: Plus, I know
he would make a big deal out of-- Dad?
Hi, sweetie.
-[audience laughs] -Surprise.
What is happening?
-[camera shuttering] -Also, why is it happening?
-[audience laughs] -Ah, he wanted me to hold him like a baby. It happens sometimes with fans.
translation.fr:
Il voulait que je le porte comme un bébé.
Ça arrive, avec les fans.

translation.en: I know I'm a cop, but I've never felt so safe.
translation.fr: Les policiers aussi aiment la sécurité.

translation.en: Welcome to Tampa, Lola!
Hey, JJ!
-[music fades] -Lola, hi!
-You cut your hair. -Cassy!
-You noticed. -[Cassy chuckles]
I noticed, too.
It's rounder and hairier.
translation.fr: C'est plus rond et plus chevelu.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -I just didn't say anything. -Because I'm lying. -[audience laughs]
translation.fr: J'ai rien dit. Parce que je mens.

translation.en: Where are your bags?
The airline's lost 'em.
The guy at the counter did say they would be delivered today.
translation.fr:
On nous a dit
qu'on les aurait aujourd'hui.

translation.en: He did put today in quotes and then laughed directly in my face, and said, "This is why I don't fly."
translation.fr:
Il a mimé des guillemets et dit en riant :
"Voilà pourquoi je ne prends pas l'avion."

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Airlines, am I right?
And don't even get me started on the food.
translation.fr: Et ne parlons pas de la nourriture.

translation.en: Don't worry, you can borrow my pajamas.
Thanks!
But, on the plus side, I'm excited to see my new room.
translation.fr: J'ai hâte de voir ma nouvelle chambre.

translation.en: Oh! Fun story about that.
You're doing a sit-in? That's right.
Like my heroes RBG, AOC and Leslie Knope.
translation.fr:
Comme mes héros :
RBG, AOC et Leslie Knope.

translation.en: Again, not a real person.
I am exercising my right to protest against oppressive forces.
translation.fr:
J'exerce mon droit de protester
contre les forces oppressives.

translation.en: In this case, you.
-[audience laughs] -Hey, Lola.
So excited you're here. Love your hair.
translation.fr:
Trop contente de te voir.
J'adore ta coupe.

translation.en: Thanks! Love your sit-in.
-[audience laughs] -This is nothing.
Wait till you see what I've got planned next.
translation.fr: Attends de voir ce que j'ai prévu.

translation.en: This revolution will not be televised, it will be live-streamed.
translation.fr: Cette révolution sera diffusée en direct.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Hi, guys!
[Mandy] Mom, Dad, this footage will be used in court
translation.fr:
Maman, papa,
je montrerai ces images au procès

translation.en: when I decide to daughter-divorce you both.
It'll probably win an Oscar, and I won't be thanking you in my speech.
translation.fr:
Je gagnerai sans doute un Oscar,
mais je ne vous remercierai pas.

translation.en: Oh yes, you will be thanking us, or you're grounded.
translation.fr: Oh que si, ou tu seras punie.

translation.en: Wait, what am I saying? This is not real.
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que je dis ? Ça n'arrivera pas.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Lola can bunk with me. It'll be fun.
FYI, I sleep walk, sleep talk and sleep eat.
translation.fr:
Je suis somnambule,
je parle et je mange en dormant.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -And if I hit a juice box after seven, get ready for some sleep peeing.
translation.fr:
Et si je bois un jus de fruit après 19 h,
je fais pipi au lit.

translation.en: [chuckles] I know I promised you you'd get your own room, and you will,
translation.fr: Tu auras ta chambre. Je te l'ai promis.

translation.en: but would you mind bunking with JJ for now?
translation.fr: D'ici là, tu peux aller avec JJ ?

translation.en: I guess I don't have a choice.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas trop le choix.

translation.en: So, do you ever actually sleep-sleep?
translation.fr: Ça t'arrive de dormir en dormant ?

translation.en: I'll sleep-sleep when I die.
Hustle don't stop, bro.
Welcome to the JJ Dome!
I gotta say,
loving the vibe in here.
Thanks, I had a vision.
-[audience laughs] -Super psyched you're here.
Make yourself comfortable.
And I want you to know,
translation.fr: Et je veux que tu saches :

translation.en: mi casa es su casa.
Except for mi legos, mi legos are not su legos.
translation.fr:
Sauf mes Lego.
mi Lego n'est pas su Lego.

translation.en: They are mine.
-[audience laughs] -Mine. Mine...
How's it going in the JJ Dome?
translation.fr: Comment ça se passe dans le JJ Dome ?

translation.en: It's okay.
Lola, I know we're off to a shaky start, but I promise I'll make it up to you.
translation.fr:
Je sais, ça commence mal.
Mais je me rattraperai, promis.

translation.en: It's not that shaky.
I mean, I don't have any of my own stuff,
translation.fr: Bon, je n'ai pas mes affaires,

translation.en: I'm sleeping in my stepmom's pajamas
translation.fr: j'ai le pyjama de ma belle-mère,

translation.en: on the top bunk of a kiddie disco -so I don't get peed on. -[audience laughs]
translation.fr:
au-dessus de la boîte de nuit
d'une gamine qui fait pipi au lit.

translation.en: -Yes, a little shaky. -Super shaky.
-[audience laughs] -But, hey, tomorrow's a brand new day, new school, new friends.
translation.fr:
Mais demain : nouvelle journée,
nouvelle école et nouveaux amis.

translation.en: New girl's hockey team. Super excited about that.
translation.fr:
- Nouvelle équipe de hockey.
- J'ai hâte.

translation.en: Once I get back on the ice, it'll feel like home.
translation.fr: Je me sentirai chez moi sur la glace.

translation.en: I'm just so happy you're here. [kisses]
translation.fr: Je suis heureux que tu sois là.

translation.en: I'm happy too.
Okay, all right! We're doing this.
Oh. Forgot to mention.
I get 50% of any tooth fairy money.
translation.fr: Je prends 50 % sur la petite souris.

translation.en: You can talk to your guy, but trust me, -it's a standard contract. -[audience laughs]
translation.fr:
Parles-en à ton avocat,
mais c'est un contrat standard.

translation.en: This is all of Mandy's homework.
You sure you're okay with her missing school?
translation.fr: Son absence ne vous fait rien ?

translation.en: Oh, everyone knows about the sit-in.
In fact, we excused most of our class to join in.
translation.fr: Presque toute la classe y participe.

translation.en: Look at the live stream.
We encourage our students to be civic thinking
translation.fr:
On encourage nos élèves
à avoir l'esprit civique

translation.en: and aware of the power they have to control their own lives.
translation.fr: et à contrôler leur propre vie.

translation.en: Control their own lives?
Have you met my daughters?
JJ once borrowed a boat, got halfway to the Keys
translation.fr:
Une fois, JJ a emprunté un bateau
pour aller aux Keys

translation.en: before she turned herself in, because she was, "Jonesing for a PB&J."
translation.fr:
et a fini par se rendre
pour "rentrer manger son goûter".

translation.en: [yelling] Incoming chest bump!
-There you are! -[together] Boom!
Hey, how was your first day? It was great, right?
It was fine. Fine? Come on!
How about your classes? Where's your locker?
translation.fr: Et les cours ? Où est ton casier ?

translation.en: Hey, do the bathrooms have those old urinals that go down to the floor?
translation.fr:
Les toilettes ont des urinoirs
qui vont jusqu'au sol ?

translation.en: Wait, you're a girl.
-[audience laughs] -Honestly, it wasn't a great day.
It's 75 degrees outside,
translation.fr:
Il fait 25 degrés
et j'ai des vêtements d'hiver

translation.en: and I'm still wearing winter clothes because my stuff is missing.
translation.fr:
Il fait 25 degrés
et j'ai des vêtements d'hiver car je n'ai pas mon sac.

translation.en: -The airlines called, they found the bags. -Great.
translation.fr:
On a retrouvé ton sac. - Super.
- À Paris.

translation.en: -In Paris. -[audience laughs]
Which you know is a great place for bags.
translation.fr: Ils s'y connaissent en sacs, là-bas.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -How does that help me? It doesn't.
-It doesn't at all. -[audience laughs]
Oh, also, there's no girls hockey team, which was pretty important to me.
translation.fr:
Il n'y a pas d'équipe de hockey féminin.
C'était important pour moi.

translation.en: On the plus side,
I was up all night, because JJ also likes to sleep sing.
translation.fr:
je n'ai pas dormi
car JJ chante en dormant.

translation.en: -I don't even know Italian. -[audience laughs]
translation.fr: Je ne parle même pas italien.

translation.en: [Big Show] I'm sorry, I just assumed there was a boys and girls team.
translation.fr:
Je pensais qu'il y avait
une équipe féminine.

translation.en: I'll fix it. I'll talk to someone at school tomorrow.
translation.fr:
Je vais arranger ça.
J'en parlerai au coach.

translation.en: No, don't do that! I'll handle it.
Aw, she gets huffy just like you.
Ugh. Whatever.
This isn't just a fight for the bedroom.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas un simple combat
pour ma chambre.

translation.en: No! It's much more than that!
translation.fr: Non. C'est bien plus que ça.

translation.en: [loudly] It's a movement!
To quote Lin-Manuel Miranda's American Express commercial,
translation.fr:
Pour citer Lin-Manuel Miranda
dans la pub American Express :

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -"We create the room where it happens."
translation.fr: "On crée la pièce où tout arrive."

translation.en: And this is that room!
[Mandy] JJ!
-[indistinct chatter] -Where did all these kids come from?
This is all happening a lot quicker than I imagined.
translation.fr: Tout va plus vite que je l'imaginais.

translation.en: Come here.
I put it on Dad's Twitter.
translation.fr: J'ai relayé sur le Twitter de papa.

translation.en: Kids are coming from everywhere.
I'm charging 20 bucks a head.
You're charging 20 bucks?
This is a movement. You cannot profit from that!
translation.fr:
C'est un mouvement.
Tu ne peux pas en tirer profit.

translation.en: You get two percent of the gate if you keep your mouth shut.
translation.fr: Je te donnerai 2 % si tu te tais.

translation.en: Ten percent, and you have to do my chores for a week.
translation.fr: 10 %, et tu fais mes corvées une semaine.

translation.en: Seven, and I get first dibs -on the bathroom in the morning. -Deal!
translation.fr:
- 7 % et prems aux toilettes le matin.
- Ça marche.

translation.en: Ha! I would've settled for 9% and a go-gurt.
translation.fr: J'aurais accepté 9 % et un yaourt en tube.

translation.en: You played yourself, girlie.
How's the haunted house going?
[sighs] Not great.
I found an exorcist on Craigslist,
translation.fr: J'ai trouvé un exorciste sur Internet

translation.en: but turns out he's just a personal trainer who didn't know how to spell.
translation.fr:
mais c'était un coach sportif
qui ne savait pas écrire.

translation.en: So, what's going on with you?
You only ask me to shave your head when you need advice.
translation.fr:
Je te rase la tête,
que quand tu veux des conseils.

translation.en: I think I'm blowing it already with Lola.
translation.fr: J'ai déjà tout gâché avec Lola.

translation.en: I just wanted it to be perfect, and everything's going wrong since the moment she landed.
translation.fr:
Je voulais que ce soit parfait,
mais tout va mal depuis son arrivée.

translation.en: Sweetie, she's only been here -like a couple days. -[sighs]
translation.fr: Elle n'est là que depuis deux jours.

translation.en: Why are you spinning out so much about this?
'Cause so long I've been a Facetime parent. Now I'm a real time parent.
translation.fr:
J'étais un père via Facetime.
Et là, c'est pour de vrai.

translation.en: It's better than when you were a butt dial parent.
translation.fr: Au moins, tu n'appelles plus par accident.

translation.en: That was just four muffled minutes ordering off the dollar menu at Wendy's.
translation.fr:
Comme ta commande de 4 minutes
de menus à un dollar au fast-food.

translation.en: -I spent a lot of dollars that night. -[laughs]
Look, you were always there for Lola, even if she didn't see you every day.
translation.fr:
Tu as toujours été là pour Lola,
même à distance.

translation.en: Yeah, but now that she's here, I want her to feel like this is her home.
translation.fr:
Aujourd'hui, elle est là.
Je veux qu'elle se sente chez elle.

translation.en: And she will, she just needs time.
[sighs] Maybe if I can get her on the hockey team, things will turn around.
translation.fr:
Si elle intègre l'équipe de hockey,
ça ira mieux.

translation.en: I wanted to talk to the coach, but Lola said I shouldn't.
translation.fr: Elle n'a pas voulu que je parle au coach.

translation.en: Yep, she's right. Let her handle it.
I don't know, I think I can help.
Show, listen to me and remember that I am holding a razor to your scalp.
translation.fr:
Show, écoute-moi et souviens-toi
que je tiens un rasoir sur ton crâne.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Do not go talk to the--
-Coach Fener? -[grunts]
[strained] Three, four...
-and five. -[door closes]
Ah, that burns right.
Dang, look at you.
What do you go, about 5'8? 5'9?
-[audience laughs] -[chuckles] Yeah, when I was like 11.
-[audience laughs] -Okay, what can I do you for, Big Gulp?
translation.fr: Que puis-je pour vous, mon grand ?

translation.en: I'm actually here about my daughter, Lola. She wants to play on the hockey team.
translation.fr:
Ma fille Lola aimerait jouer
dans l'équipe de hockey.

translation.en: Yeah, [sighs] I'm gonna tell you the same thing I told her.
translation.fr: Je vous répondrai la même chose qu'à elle.

translation.en: There aren't enough girls in Tampa who wanna play ice hockey.
translation.fr:
Trop peu de filles ici
veulent jouer au hockey.

translation.en: Yeah, come on, there's gotta be some kind of a compromise?
translation.fr: On doit pouvoir trouver un compromis.

translation.en: -[chuckles] I don't compromise. -[audience laughs]
I come from a military family. [exhales] You think there's compromise in war?
translation.fr:
Je suis fils de militaires.
On fait des compromis à la guerre ?

translation.en: -Yeah, that's literally how they end. -[audience laughs]
translation.fr: On y met fin comme ça, oui.

translation.en: Listen, Double Stuff!
-Don't call me Double Stuff. -Why?
'Cause I don't like it.
And when I don't like something, I break it.
translation.fr: Et quand j'aime pas, je casse.

translation.en: Are you threatening a military man?
No, I am threatening a P.E. teacher who shops at Baby Gap.
translation.fr:
Juste un prof d'EPS
qui s'habille au rayon enfants.

translation.en: It's time to go.
Oh! [stammers] Before you do, could you actually hang this photo for me -up on the wall? [laughs] -[audience laughs]
translation.fr:
Mais avant, vous pouvez accrocher
ce cadre au mur ?

translation.en: Thank you so much, [inhales, lowers tone] Double Stuff.
I just don't wanna talk about it!
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas en parler.

translation.en: What was I supposed to do? Nothing!
Like I literally told you to do! Could not have been clearer!
translation.fr:
Comme je te l'ai dit
on ne peut plus clairement !

translation.en: What happened?
I just talked to the coach.
Talk? I wish you just talked!
-[audience laughs] -Ah, come on, man! This is not cool!
Hey, sweetie.
Oh, him?
-He was like that when I got here. -[audience laughs] Let's go, quickly.
translation.fr: Je l'ai trouvé comme ça. Filons !

translation.en: Good news is coach changed his mind. I had nothing to do with it.
translation.fr:
Mais il a changé d'avis.
Je n'ai rien à voir là-dedans.

translation.en: -So there's a girl's team now? -Nope.
translation.fr:
- Il y a une équipe de filles ?
- Non.

translation.en: -Oh, no. -Yep.
-[audience laughs] -What? The coach is gonna let her try out for the boys team.
translation.fr:
Quoi ? Le coach va la laisser jouer
avec les garçons.

translation.en: I mean, it's 2020, what about RBG and ABC, and all that feminist stuff?
translation.fr:
On est en 2020. Que fais-tu de RBG, ABC,
et tous ces trucs féministes ?

translation.en: It's AOC!
ABC is what old people watch when they don't know how to find YouTube.
translation.fr:
Les vieux qui ne trouvent pas YouTube
regardent ABC !

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -That totally tracks, I've done that.
translation.fr: Elle a raison, c'est mon cas.

translation.en: And a girl on a boys team is so played out.
translation.fr:
Et les garçons n'aiment pas jouer
avec les filles.

translation.en: Every time I get on the ice, the guys are afraid to check me, or they don't pass me the puck.
translation.fr:
Ils refusent de me charger
ou de me passer le palet.

translation.en: So show those stupid boys you're better than them.
translation.fr: Montre-leur que tu es meilleure qu'eux.

translation.en: I will!
I'm gonna go to that tryout tomorrow and kill it.
But if I'm gonna be on the boys team, I wanna earn it my way.
translation.fr:
Mais pour jouer avec les garçons,
je dois le mériter.

translation.en: By myself!
You don't have to do it by yourself anymore.
translation.fr: Tu n'as plus à faire ça seule.

translation.en: Yes, I do.
That's how I work.
Now if you'll excuse me, I'm gonna go up to my room.
translation.fr: Excuse-moi, je monte dans ma chambre.

translation.en: Oh, wait! I don't have one.
translation.fr: Une minute. Je n'en ai pas.

translation.en: What? He called me Double Stuff.
-[audience laughs] -Show, I specifically told you not to do anything.
translation.fr: Je t'avais dit de ne rien faire.

translation.en: I know, you're right, but in my defense, I did not listen to you.
translation.fr:
C'est vrai, mais pour ma défense,
je ne t'ai pas écouté.

translation.en: -[mellow music playing] -[phone chimes]
Hey, I, uh, didn't know you were out here.
translation.fr: Je ne savais pas que tu étais là.

translation.en: Yeah, I just, needed some privacy.
You hear about Dad and Coach Fener?
translation.fr: Tu es au courant pour le coach ?

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
I heard Dad punched Coach Fener so hard in the stomach,
translation.fr: Papa l'a frappé si fort au ventre,

translation.en: he went from an outtie to an innie.
-[audience laughs] -What? No, that's not what happened.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas ce qui s'est passé.

translation.en: But, is Dad always like this?
Look, he means well, and his heart's in the right place.
translation.fr: Il veut bien faire et il a bon cœur.

translation.en: He just can't control himself.
translation.fr: Mais il ne se contrôle pas.

translation.en: He's like a giant puppy in a house of bacon.
translation.fr: Comme un chiot géant chez le boucher.

translation.en: Hey, where were you?
Oh, I was just hanging out at none of your business.
-[audience laughs] -What's up?
We were just talking about Dad.
I heard he crushed Coach F, and now he has to poop into a bag.
translation.fr:
Il a écrabouillé le coach,
qui doit faire caca dans un sac.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -What? No, he just hung him up on the wall like a stuffed marlin.
translation.fr:
Non, il l'a juste accroché au mur
comme un trophée.

translation.en: Wow, this story has gotten out of control.
[sighs deeply] And so has this sit-in.
I need this to be over, but I can't cave to mom and dad.
translation.fr:
Je veux arrêter, mais pas céder
à maman et papa.

translation.en: It sets a bad precedent.
Mandy, if I can get them to cave, can I please have the room?
translation.fr:
Si je les fais céder,
je pourrai avoir ta chambre ?

translation.en: I could really use my own space for right now.
translation.fr: J'ai besoin d'un endroit à moi.

translation.en: Yes, the kids in my room suck!
translation.fr:
Oui, les enfants dans ma chambre
sont nuls.

translation.en: They keep recommending podcasts about natural deodorant to me.
translation.fr:
Ils me montrent des podcasts
sur les déodorants naturels.

translation.en: What are we gonna do?
We just have to escalate and manipulate things where they have no choice but to cave.
translation.fr:
On va intensifier les choses
et les manipuler pour qu'ils cèdent.

translation.en: Manipulate?
Now you're talking my language.
-[audience laughs] -I need 50 bucks, Mom and Dad's passports,
translation.fr:
Il me faut 50 $,
les passeports de maman et papa,

translation.en: and you two ding-dongs to keep your mouth shut.
translation.fr: et vous deux, vous la bouclez.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Okay, we're not doing whatever that is,
but I do have a plan.
I'm so glad you're here, Lola.
See? I love this.
With you here, Lola, we outnumber them.
translation.fr: Avec toi, Lola, on est plus nombreux.

translation.en: We'll always get our way. As long as we have each other's backs.
translation.fr:
On gagnera toujours.
Tant qu'on se soutient.

translation.en: Sister to sister to sister.
-JJ, put my wallet back in my pocket. -[audience laughs]
translation.fr: JJ, remets mon portefeuille dans ma poche.

translation.en: You know I had to try.
-[whistle blows] -[Coach F] Yeah! Nice!
Nice shot!
-Nice! Move those skates! -[sticks clatter]
-[skates hiss on ice] -Very nice!
Mom told us to stay in the car.
translation.fr: Elle nous a dit de rester dans la voiture.

translation.en: -[giggles] We were never doing that. -[audience laughs]
-[Coach F] And shoot! -[punk clanks]
Ah, come on!
Lola was totally right. The boys won't play her straight up.
translation.fr:
Lola avait raison.
Les garçons ne jouent pas avec elle.

translation.en: There has to be a way to show them she's tough and can take it.
translation.fr:
Il faut leur montrer
que c'est une dure à cuire.

translation.en: Oh, no. I can see it in your eyes.
translation.fr: Oh, non. Je le vois dans tes yeux.

translation.en: Something cray-cray is about to happen.
translation.fr: Tu vas faire un truc dingo.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -And whatever it is, I'm capital I-N-N, in.
translation.fr:
Je suis avec toi.
Aussi sûr que deux et deux font trois.

translation.en: You do know that "in" is spelled with one "N"?
translation.fr: Deux et deux font quatre, tu sais ?

translation.en: You took me out of school for this. That's on you, homeboy.
translation.fr: C'est de ta faute si je manque l'école.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Good point.
I know I've done everything wrong since Lola got here.
translation.fr:
Je fais tout de travers
depuis que Lola est ici.

translation.en: If she wants to do this her way,
translation.fr: Elle veut le faire à sa façon ?

translation.en: I gotta fix this.
-[indistinct yelling] -My way.
Alright, get some water. Back on the ice in five.
translation.fr:
Allez boire un coup.
On reprend dans 5 min.

translation.en: There you go.
Oh, no, he's back.
He's bigger. Somehow he's getting bigger.
-[audience laughs] -No, he's just getting closer to me.
translation.fr: En fait, il se rapproche de moi.

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -Check me.
What? No!
Check me in the boards, knock me on my butt!
Show them what you can do! I'm not gonna hit you.
translation.fr:
- Montre-leur.
- Je ne te chargerai pas.

translation.en: God, can't you ever just leave me alone?
No, I'm not going away. I wasn't there for you for so many years.
translation.fr:
Je ne te laisserai pas.
J'ai été absent trop longtemps.

translation.en: And I'm never doing that again. I'm in your life, whether you like it
translation.fr: C'est terminé. Je suis dans ta vie, quoi que tu en dises.

translation.en: or not. If you want me
translation.fr: Je suis dans ta vie, quoi que tu en dises. Tu devras me forcer à partir.

translation.en: to go away, you're gonna have to make me.
translation.fr: Tu devras me forcer à partir.

translation.en: Unless you're too scared.
translation.fr: Sauf si tu as la trouille.

translation.en: -[helmet thuds] -Dad! You okay? I'm sorry.
[struggling] Oh, I'm the one that should be sorry.
I just wanted everything to be perfect for you.
translation.fr: Je voulais que tout soit parfait.

translation.en: I wanted you to feel like you were home.
translation.fr: Que tu te sentes chez toi.

translation.en: You know what's weird?
Slamming you into the boards has kind of been the first moment this has felt like home.
translation.fr:
En te poussant sur la bande,
je me suis sentie chez moi.

translation.en: -Ah, that was my plan all along. -Really?
translation.fr:
- C'était mon plan depuis le début.
- Ah bon ?

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -No, I'm making this stuff up as I go.
translation.fr: Non, j'invente au fur et à mesure.

translation.en: This is all gonna get easier, right?
I sure hope so, I'm not gonna be able to walk for a week.
translation.fr:
J'espère. Je ne pourrai pas marcher
pendant une semaine.

translation.en: But I promise, in the future, I'll wait till you asked for help.
translation.fr:
Mais à l'avenir, je ne t'aiderai
que si tu le demandes.

translation.en: And I promise to think about asking for your help. [laughs]
translation.fr:
Et je te promets de songer
à te demander ton aide.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Deal.
That was awesome.
Okay, what I'm gonna need is for us to do it one more time.
I'd love to get it in slo-mo.
[Cassy] We will come down on the price of the house.
translation.fr: On baissera le prix de la maison.

translation.en: [scoffs] No, there aren't ghosts, there is a ghost.
translation.fr:
Il n'y a pas de fantômes.
Il y a un seul fantôme.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -It's an old lady in a Victorian nightgown. If anything, it classes up the place.
translation.fr:
Une vieille dame en chemise victorienne.
Une touche d'élégance.

translation.en: Hello?
-So, how'd it go? -[door closes]
Good! I stayed in the car the whole time. JJ sent me the video.
translation.fr:
- J'ai attendu dans la voiture.
- J'ai vu la vidéo.

translation.en: [sighs] You ratted me out to Mom?
She promised me a Nintendo Switch if I flipped.
translation.fr: Elle m'a promis une Nintendo Switch.

translation.en: And I want that Switch, baby.
Good news, Lola. Your bags have arrived.
[exhales] Finally! Yes, all right!
Things are starting to turn around for the old...
-Zane Rutlidge from Detroit, Michigan. -[audience laughs]
These are not my bags.
translation.fr: Ce ne sont pas les miens.

translation.en: You know, sometimes, we don't get the bags we want,
translation.fr: Parfois, on n'a pas les sacs qu'on veut,

translation.en: but we get the bags we need.
-[audience laughs] -What does that mean? I don't know, I was just trying to help.
translation.fr:
- Ça veut dire quoi ?
- Je voulais aider.

translation.en: You know what? It's cool. They'll get here eventually.
translation.fr:
En fait, c'est pas grave.
Ils finiront par arriver.

translation.en: -[indistinct chatter] -[Cassy] Who are those kids?
They're from Orlando.
Ugh. I hate kids from Orlando.
translation.fr:
Ils viennent d'Orlando. Je déteste les enfants d'Orlando.
Ils empestent Disney.

translation.en: -They got that Disney stink on 'em. -[audience laughs]
translation.fr:
Je déteste les enfants d'Orlando.
Ils empestent Disney.

translation.en: Mandy's protest is blowing up on Twitter.
translation.fr:
La protestation de Mandy
explose sur Twitter.

translation.en: This thing is getting huge.
Is that a drum circle?
[groans] I cannot stand drum circles! They're never in rhythm.
translation.fr:
Je déteste ça !
Ils ne jouent jamais en rythme.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Girls, go upstairs.
Babe, I think we have to cave. To cave? No, no.
I won't cave.
I will hold the line to the end of days.
translation.fr: Je tiendrai bon jusqu'à la fin des temps.

translation.en: I was once in a three-hour standoff with an old lady for a parking spot in front of TJ Maxx.
translation.fr:
On s'est disputés une place de parking
trois heures avec une dame, un jour.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -I will never, ever,
ever,
-[gruff] ever, cave. -[audience laughs]
We're going to need mattresses, because my people want to sleep over.
translation.fr:
On a besoin de matelas.
Mes partisans dorment ici.

translation.en: And they're going to need to use your bathroom.
Okay, you win, you can keep the room.
translation.fr: Tu as gagné, garde la chambre.

translation.en: Way to hold the line, Braveheart.
And now that I've won and proven my point,
translation.fr: Maintenant que j'ai gagné et eu raison,

translation.en: I'll suspend the sit-in.
Lola can have the room.
Thank you.
Hey, Dad, remember the whole asking for help thing?
translation.fr: Papa, tu m'aideras si je te le demande ?

translation.en: -Yeah? -Well, can you please help me
translation.fr:
- Oui.
- Dans ce cas, tu m'aides à les faire sortir
de ma chambre ?

translation.en: get these kids out of my new room?
translation.fr:
tu m'aides à les faire sortir
de ma chambre ?

translation.en: Oh, I thought you'd never ask.
[yelling] All right! I am bigger, stronger, -and balder than everyone in this room! -[audience laughs]
translation.fr:
Je suis plus grand, plus fort
et plus chauve que tout le monde ici.

translation.en: If you are not related to me, or a dependent on my taxes,
translation.fr:
Si vous n'êtes ni de ma famille
ni sur mon avis d'imposition,

translation.en: get out!
[screaming] Now!
God, I love helping.
-[music fades] -Hey, kiddo. Look, sorry again about the bags.
translation.fr:
Coucou, ma grande.
Désolé pour tes bagages.

translation.en: If you want, I can take you to the mall tomorrow, buy you some new clothes.
translation.fr: Je t'emmène acheter des vêtements demain ?

translation.en: What do you need, like, underwear, bras? I'm gonna have Cassy take you to the mall.
translation.fr:
Des sous-vêtements ?
Il vaut mieux que Cassy t'emmène.

translation.en: -Good call. -[audience laughs]
Where did you find that?
It was in my bag. I didn't want it to break.
translation.fr:
Je l'ai gardé avec moi
pour ne pas le casser.

translation.en: You remember that day?
-Of course I remember that day. -[mellow music plays]
You spilled hot chocolate all over your pants,
translation.fr: Ton cacao a taché ton pantalon,

translation.en: and then we made a life size Big Show snowman
translation.fr: et on a fait un énorme bonhomme de neige.

translation.en: Biggest snowman ever. That sucker didn't melt till July.
translation.fr: En effet, il a mis des mois à fondre.

translation.en: -Are you gonna cry? -No!
Yes, but later when I'm in the bath.
translation.fr: Si, mais plus tard, dans mon bain.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Come on, It's movie night.
We're having Mediterranean food.
-This hero needs some gyros. -[audience laughs]
translation.fr: Ce héros a besoin d'un gyros.

translation.en: Oh my God, was that a dad joke?
I dunno, it's all Greek to me.
Ooh, two in a row, you gotta go.
translation.fr: Deux à la suite ? Allez, sors.

translation.en: [imitating Mr. T] I "pita" the fool that does dad jokes!
translation.fr: Mes blagues, c’est la "feta" à la maison !

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Okay, seriously, get out!
-Love you! -Love you.
Oh, well. [clears throat] Okay,
before we eat, you know the rules.
translation.fr:
Avant de manger,
vous connaissez les règles.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -Best part of your day, Mandy.
translation.fr: Temps fort de ta journée, Mandy.

translation.en: Well, I have seven best parts.
-Pick one, I'm hungry. -[audience laughs]
Today, I became the first middle sister to make real change in our world.
translation.fr:
Je suis devenue la première cadette
à changer le monde.

translation.en: That can't possibly be true, but carry on.
Point is, I can't stop now.
I can see my own future.
So, I have decided to run -for Lower School President. -[Cassy gasps]
translation.fr:
J'ai donc décidé de me présenter
au poste de déléguée de classe.

translation.en: Sick! I'm in.
Rigging an election is on my bucket list.
translation.fr: Truquer une élection, c'est sur ma liste.

translation.en: That, and learning how to tie my shoes.
translation.fr: Et apprendre à faire mes lacets.

translation.en: -[audience laughs] -You know, when I was your age, I was Lower School President in my school.
translation.fr:
Quand j'avais ton âge,
j'étais délégué de classe.

translation.en: -[Cassy and Mandy] No, you weren't. -Yes, I was!
[Mandy] That is crazy.
-[Mandy] No, I don't believe you. -[JJ] No...
I'm telling the truth. I actually got impeached.
-I'm telling the truth! -[Mandy] This seems like a joke. -[JJ] How? -I used to kick the soda machine,
translation.fr:
MAMAN - SI TU ES MALHEUREUSE,
JE TROUVERAI UNE SOLUTION.

translation.en: and it would spit sodas out, and I'd sell them on the bus ride home.
translation.fr: VIENS VIVRE AVEC MOI À BRUXELLES.

translation.en: -[Cassy] How dare you? -[Big Show] I know.
translation.fr: LOLA - JE T'AIME MAIS JE SUIS BIEN ICI

translation.en: -You stole my gyro. -I stole your gyro.
translation.fr:
- Tu m'as pris mon gyros.
- Oui.

translation.en: Subtitle translation by
